section.title: The Find Deposit Slips screen.
section.para: This screen is used to locate payment groups and their associated deposit slips that have been created. Deposit slips are created by grouping transactions together into a Payment Group. This can be done using the 'Accounting / Payment Group' tab, the 'Financial Account / Deposit Withdraw' tab or the 'Create New Deposit Slip' button.
Currently Deposit Slips are created for AR Batch Payments only.
The deposit slips are available in PDF format and there is an option to cancel the batch that generated the deposit slip if required.

section.title: How do I locate an existing Deposit Slip?
section.para: Enter some characters from the 'Payment Group Id' or 'Payment Group Name' if known

section.title: How do I update an existing Deposit Slip?

listitem.para: Select the Payment Group by clicking on the Payment Group Id

section.para: The 'Edit Payment Group' screen is displayed
Add any new payment deposits or update existing deposits for the Payment Group
All changes in the Payment Group will automatically be updated to the Deposit Slip

section.title: How do I delete an existing Deposit Slip?
section.para: A deposit slip can not be directly deleted but it is removed when a Payment Group is cancelled
Press the 'Cancel' button next to the Payment Group required to cancel a payment group
The Payment Group is removed from the 'Find Deposits' screen and no deposit slips can be viewed or printed.
